Name: nep-ahlalhadithcent-la
Author: Ahl Al Hadith Central Society Of Nepal

Translations.Text: Usale socyo ra adkalale e'uta kura banayo
Nasta hos usale kasto adkala garyo
pheri tyo nasta hos, usale kasto adkala garyo
usale pheri dekhyo
Pheri nidhara khumcyayo ra mukha bigarihalyo
Ani pithyum pharka'i hindyo ra ghamanda garyo
Ani bhannathalyo ki yo ta matra jadu ho, juna nakkala gari'eko cha
Yo matra manisako vani nai ho
Hamile sighra nai usala'i narkama halnechaum
Ra timila'i ke thaha ki ‘‘narka’’ ke ho
(ago ho) jo na bamki rakhnecha na ta choddacha
Ra sarirako chalala'i polera kalo bana'idinecha
Tyasama unna'isa (pharista) karyakartaharu niyukta chan

Ra hamile narkako dvarapalaharu pharistaharula'i bana'eka chaum ra hamile uniharuko sankhya kaphiraharuko pariksako nimti nirdharita gareka chaum, yasakarana ki kitabavalale visvasa garun ra mominaharuko imana aru dherai badhos ra kitaba manneharu ra mominale sanka nagarun ra juna manisaharuko hrdayama roga cha, uni ra kaphiraharule bhanun ki yasa drstantabata allahako ke uddesya cha? Yastai prakarale allahale jasala'i cahancha, margavicalita gardacha ra jasala'i cahancha margadarsana gardacha. Timro palanakartaka laskaraharula'i usa baheka kohi jandaina ra yo ta adamako santatiko lagi upadesa ra siksa samagri ho
Samco bhandachu (hamila'i) camdako kasama
Ra ratako jaba ki tyasale pachadi hatdacha
Ra pratahkalako jaba ki tyo prakasita bha'ihalos
Niscaya nai narka thulo kuraharumadhye eka ho
Manisaharuko nimti bhayako karana
Timadhye tyasa vyaktiko nimti jo agadi badhna cahancha va pachadi hatna cahancha
Hareka vyakti aphno karmako badalama dhito rakhi'eko cha
Tara dayam hata valaharu
Uniharu svargaharuma baseka hunechan ra prasna garnechan
Aparadhiharusamga
(ki) timila'i kuna kurole narkama lyayo
uniharule javapha dinechan ki hami namaji thi'enaum
Ra na nimukhaharula'i (miskinaharula'i) khana khuva'umthyau
ra hamile vivada garne asatyavadiharuko sathama milera vyasta hune gardathyaum
Ra badalako dina (kiyamata) la'i asatya thahara'umthyau
Yahamsam'ma ki hamila'i mutyu a'ilagyo
